topic: 8. Which is not one of the key questions that is answered by each team member at each daily Scrum meeting?
options: What did you do since the last meeting?
What do you plan to accomplish be the next team meeting?
topic_cn: 8. 以下哪一项不是每位团队成员在每日Scrum会议上需要回答的关键问题？
options_cn: 自上次会议以来你做了什么？
你计划在下次团队会议前完成什么？
